thread.title: Sky Dancer is a new and beautiful endless running and falling game
thread.title_full: Sky Dancer is a new and beautiful endless running and falling game

author: John Callaham
title: Sky Dancer is a new and beautiful endless running and falling game
text:
There are tons of endless runner-style games to choose from in the Google Play Store already. Few of them are as beautiful looking as the recently launched Sky Dancer, from Vietnam-based developer Pine Entertainment.
See also: Best offline Android games 2 weeks ago 
Indeed, the minimalist art style for this game reminds one of the great Monument Valley. However, instead of trying to solve puzzles, the main objective of the “Sky Dancer” is to run, jump and fall from floating platforms, and hope that another one pops up to land on so you can keep running to the next floating platform. As you might expect, the controls are simple. You keep running automatically, with tapping on the left of the screen making your character move left, and tapping on the right to move to the right. Tapping on both sides at the same time causes the character to jump.
There are actually 10 different Sky Dancers you can pick from and more will be coming in future updates. While the game is free to download and play, be aware there are in-game purchases that are as high as $94.99, so you might want to be watching when your kids play it. What are your impressions of Sky Dancer? Let us know what you think in the comments!
Get it at Google Play
